column3: Casey asks Jaylene to choose any 9 dates in a calendar that form a square, such as the one below. When Jaylene shares the sum of the 9 dates, Casey knows a trick to find the 9 dates.

column3: Edited by Fred Dillon, dillon314@sbcglobal.net, a math educator from Strongsville, Ohio, and Kevin Dykema, k.dykema@mattawanschool.org, a teacher in Mattawan, Michigan. Manuscripts should show how math is used to solve a real-life problem, preferably in the context of one's profession, and should be no more than 300 words. Submit manuscripts through http://mtms.msubmit.net.
